amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 116-19 to recognize the severity of the gender wage gap for girls and women of color.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Torres (CA) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mrs. Torres (CA).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Torres (CA) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
